```{python, results = 'hide', fig.cap = "Check it"}
# Import the library
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib_venn import venn3
 
# Make the diagram
v = venn3(subsets = (400, 500, 100, 300,200,50,50), set_labels = ("X", "Y", "Z"))
v.get_patch_by_id('100').set_color('orange')
v.get_patch_by_id('010').set_color('blue')
v.get_patch_by_id('001').set_color('#ff0099')
plt.show()
```
